attributes.comment:
I am strongly opposed to the proposed to the unreasonable increase in fees for
the adoption related petitions. I understand that your processing costs may be
going up but I find it hard to believe your costs are increasing 66% year over year.
I didn't realize the US Citizenship & Immigration Services was a for-profit
department of the government.

Please reconsider your fee increase. Many families like our are trying to adopt
orphan children around the world. The costs are already high and tough to afford,
this just makes it more difficult for families to find the money to bring these
wonderful children into our homes in America.

Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
